title: Write README file
text: Make a README file for the app, start in your README generator app, then commit to the repo, then edit the file on github.

title: Add some comments
text: Self explanatory: add comments where it will be helpful (might have all the comments you need already).

title: Re-read the README
text: Go over the README a few more times and make sure that you got everything.

title: Refactor for efficiency
text: See if you can make some of your functions single line. Add functions for duplicate code. Condense where possible.
